ValidationRule.description: When the Request reason take the rest offline the 'take offfline date' & 'Result' should be mandatory
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Request_Reason__c , "Take Restaurant Offline"), ISBLANK( Take_Offline_Date__c ), ISPICKVAL( Status__c , "Completed"), ISPICKVAL( Result__c ,"" ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter all the mandatory fields
